name: Natural Selection Simulator (4ustinF)
description:
Natural Selection Simulator is a 3D first person survival shooter. The idea was inspired by the arcade game Big Buck Hunter where all you do is hunt animals, but in this game they hunt you back. To help along the way you can unlock guns and upgrade your stats to help survive immense waves of the animal hordes. 

This game was the final project for my Programming in game engines class. This was my first time making a 3D game in Unity and I had a blast. Let me know what you think!

Assets used:

Background Music Artist: https://beatsbyboi.bandcamp.com/

Player Model: https://www.mixamo.com/#/

Gun SoundFX: https://freesound.org/

Others: https://assetstore.unity.com/

P.S. It says gullible on the ceiling.
